languages.text: "Запрос одобрен, как доктринально верный". {n}Паскаль склоняется над существом, и звук активировавшегося бура звучит визгливо и безжалостно. Голос техножреца исполнен ледяной целеустремленности божественного вивисектора.{/n} "Да будет прерван Цикл, да будут прервано незнание".

"Request approved as doctrinally correct." {n}Pasqal leans over the creature and the drill whirrs, sounding shrill and relentless. The Tech-Priest's voice hums with the ice-cold determination of a divine vivisector:{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued, let ignorance be discontinued!"
languages.original_text: "Запрос одобрен, как доктринально верный". {n}Паскаль склоняется над существом, и звук активировавшегося бура звучит визгливо и безжалостно. Голос техножреца исполнен ледяной целеустремленности божественного вивисектора.{/n} "Да будет прерван Цикл, да будут прервано незнание".

traits.locale_text: "The request is approved as doctrinally correct." {n}Pasqal leans over the creature, and the sound of the activated drill sounds shrill and relentless. The tech-priest's voice hums with the ice-cold determination of a divine vivisector.{/n} "May the cycle be broken, may ignorance be undone."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「要求は教義上正しいものとして承認された」{n}パスカルが生き物の上に身を乗り出すと、ドリルの音が単調に、なだめるように、正確に響く。技術司祭の声は、神聖な生体探知者の氷のような冷徹な決意でハミングしている。{/n} 「サイクルを止めよ、無知が止まるように！」
languages.original_text: "Request approved as doctrinally correct." {n}Pasqal leans over the creature and the drill whirrs, sounding shrill and relentless. The Tech-Priest's voice hums with the ice-cold determination of a divine vivisector:{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued, let ignorance be discontinued!"

traits.locale_text: 「要求は教義上正しいものとして承認された」{n}パスカルが生き物の上に身を乗り出すと、ドリルの音が単調に、なだめるように、正確に響く。技術司祭の声は、神聖な生体探知者の氷のような冷徹な決意でハミングしている。{/n} 「サイクルを止めよ、無知が止まるように！」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “请求符合教义，已接受。”{n}帕斯卡俯下身子，电钻嗡嗡作响，声音听起来刺耳而无情。帕斯卡的声音嗡嗡作响，充满了解剖者冰冷的决心。{/n}“让循环停止！让一切无知消失！”
languages.original_text: "Request approved as doctrinally correct." {n}Pasqal leans over the creature and the drill whirrs, sounding shrill and relentless. The Tech-Priest's voice hums with the ice-cold determination of a divine vivisector:{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued, let ignorance be discontinued!"

traits.locale_text: “请求符合教义，已接受。”{n}帕斯卡俯下身子，看着这台机械，电钻的声音听起来刺耳而无情。帕斯卡的声音嗡嗡作响，充满了解剖者冰冷的决心。{/n}“让循环停止！让一切无知消失！”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Solicitud aprobada como doctrinalmente correcta». {n}Pasqal se inclina sobre la criatura y la perforadora vibra con un sonido estridente e implacable. La voz del tecnosacerdote resuena con la fría determinación de un vivisector divino.{/n} «¡Que se interrumpa el ciclo, que se interrumpa la ignorancia!».
languages.original_text: "Request approved as doctrinally correct." {n}Pasqal leans over the creature and the drill whirrs, sounding shrill and relentless. The Tech-Priest's voice hums with the ice-cold determination of a divine vivisector:{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued, let ignorance be discontinued!"

traits.locale_text: «Solicitud aprobada como doctrinalmente correcta». {n}Pasqal se inclina sobre la criatura y el sonido de la perforadora es estridente e implacable. La voz del tecnosacerdote resuena con la fría determinación de un vivisector divino.{/n} «¡Que se interrumpa el ciclo, que se deshaga la ignorancia!».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Anfrage akzeptiert, da sie im Einklang mit der Doktrin steht." {n}Als sich Pasqal über die Kreatur beugt, klingt das Summen des Bohrers schrill und skrupellos. In der Stimme des Techpriesters summt die eiskalte Entschlossenheit eines göttlichen Vivisektors:{/n} "Möge der Zyklus unterbrochen werden und die Ignoranz enden!"
languages.original_text: "Request approved as doctrinally correct." {n}Pasqal leans over the creature and the drill whirrs, sounding shrill and relentless. The Tech-Priest's voice hums with the ice-cold determination of a divine vivisector:{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued, let ignorance be discontinued!"

traits.locale_text: "Anfrage akzeptiert, da sie im Einklang mit der Doktrin steht." {n}Pasqal beugt sich über die Kreatur. Das Geräusch, als sich sein Bohrer einschaltet, klingt schrill und gnadenlos. In der Stimme des Techpriesters summt die eiskalte Entschlossenheit eines göttlichen Vivisektors.{/n} "Auf dass der Zyklus nicht fortgesetzt werde, möge Ignoranz ausgelöscht werden!"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Demande approuvée, conforme à la doctrine. » {n}Pasqal se penche sur la créature et sa perceuse gronde de façon impitoyable. La voix du technoprêtre résonne de la détermination glaciale d'un vivisecteur divin.{/n} « Que le Cycle soit rompu, et que cesse l'ignorance ! »
languages.original_text: "Request approved as doctrinally correct." {n}Pasqal leans over the creature and the drill whirrs, sounding shrill and relentless. The Tech-Priest's voice hums with the ice-cold determination of a divine vivisector:{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued, let ignorance be discontinued!"

traits.locale_text: « Demande approuvée, conforme à la doctrine. » {n}Pasqal se penche sur la créature et sa perceuse se remet à l'œuvre, mais cette fois de manière encore plus impitoyable. La voix du technoprêtre résonne de la détermination glaciale d'un vivisecteur divin.{/n} « Que le Cycle soit rompu, et que votre ignorance prenne fin ! »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Talebin öğretilerle uyumlu olduğu onaylandı." {n}Yaratığa eğilen Pasqal'ın matkabının vızıltısı, kulağa tiz ve rahatsız edici geliyor. Tekno Rahip'in sesi; anestezisiz, ilahi bir ameliyat yapmanın buz gibi kararlılığıyla vızıldıyor.{/n} "Döngü'nün süreği bozulsun! Cehaletin süreği bozulsun!"
languages.original_text: "Request approved as doctrinally correct." {n}Pasqal leans over the creature and the drill whirrs, sounding shrill and relentless. The Tech-Priest's voice hums with the ice-cold determination of a divine vivisector:{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued, let ignorance be discontinued!"

traits.locale_text: "Talebin öğretilerle uyumlu olduğu onaylandı." {n}Pasqal yaratığa eğiliyor ve matkabının vızıltısı kulağa tiz ve rahatsız edici geliyor. Tekno Rahip'in sesi, ilahi bir canlı ameliyat yapmanın buz gibi kararlılığıyla vızıldırıyor.{/n} "Döngü'nün süreği bozulsun! Cehaletin süreği bozulsun!"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
